english.segment1: Im not the same. I have been changed. By the power of Christ. The truth in my life. I cant explain. The difference Hes made. Old things have gone something new has begun
english.segment2: [Chorus:]. This is the day of my salvation. I will rejoice with a song of praise. This is the day of my salvation. I will rejoice in Christ, my salvation
english.segment3: Im not the same. I have been changed. The hope that Ive found. Has turned me around. I finally feel. Forgiveness thats real. This thankful heart gets a brand new start
english.segment4: [Bridge:]. Come, let us be glad. Come, let us rejoice
